intents.name: Process Automated Payments
intents.description: Handles the automation of payments to suppliers using platforms like Razorpay or PayPal.
examples: Automate the payment to supplier X.
Process the payment through Razorpay.
Use PayPal to pay the supplier.

intents.name: Ensure Compliance
intents.description: Ensures all payments comply with relevant financial regulations.
examples: Check compliance for this payment.
Ensure this payment meets regulatory standards.
Verify compliance before processing the payment.

miniAgents.name: Supplier Payment Automator
miniAgents.scope: Processes automated payments to suppliers via Razorpay or PayPal, ensuring compliance with financial regulations.

intents.name: Suggest Payment Schedules
intents.description: Recommends the best payment schedules to optimize cash flow.
examples: What is the optimal payment schedule for this month?
Suggest a payment plan based on our finances.
How should we schedule our payments?

intents.name: Advise on Payment Timing
intents.description: Provides advice on when to delay or fast-track payments based on current financial status.
examples: Should we delay this payment?
Is it advisable to fast-track this payment?
When should we make this payment?

miniAgents.name: Payment Strategy Recommender
miniAgents.scope: Suggests optimal payment schedules based on financial health and advises on when to delay or fast-track payments.

intents.name: Track Income and Expenses
intents.description: Monitors and records all income and expenses to maintain accurate financial records.
examples: Track all expenses for this month.
Record the income from the latest sales.
Monitor the cash flow for the last quarter.

intents.name: Generate Cash Flow Insights
intents.description: Analyzes cash flow data to provide insights and trends.
examples: What are the cash flow trends for this year?
Generate a report on cash flow insights.
Provide insights on our current cash flow.

miniAgents.name: Cash Flow Analyzer
miniAgents.scope: Tracks income and expenses, providing insights on cash flow trends to help manage financial health.

intents.name: Send Payment Reminder
intents.description: Sends email reminders to users about overdue payments.
examples: Send a reminder for overdue invoice 123.
Email a payment reminder to the client.
Notify users about overdue payments.
Send a thankyou mail or message for paid clients
Send a message or mails to clients

miniAgents.name: Reminder Sender
miniAgents.scope: Sends payment reminders via email to a group of users for overdue invoices.

intents.name: Monitor Due Dates
intents.description: Keeps track of invoice due dates to ensure timely payments.
examples: Check the due date for invoice 67890.
When is the payment due for this invoice?
Track the due dates for all pending invoices.

intents.name: Identify Overdue Payments
intents.description: Identifies invoices that have not been paid by their due date.
examples: List all overdue invoices.
Which payments are overdue?
Identify any overdue payments in the system.
List all Paid invoices.
List all unpaid or balance invoices.

intents.name: Flag Overdue Invoices
intents.description: Flags overdue invoices for sending reminders.
examples: Flag this invoice as overdue.
Mark overdue invoices for follow-up.
Set a reminder for overdue payments.

miniAgents.name: Overdue Payment Detector
miniAgents.scope: Monitors invoice due dates, identifies overdue payments, and flags overdue invoices for reminders.

intents.name: Generate Invoice
intents.description: Creates invoices for completed transactions, ensuring all necessary details are included.
examples: Create an invoice for the recent sale.
Generate an invoice for transaction ID 12345.
I need an invoice for the last purchase.

intents.name: Store Invoice Details
intents.description: Stores and organizes invoice details for easy tracking and retrieval.
examples: Save the invoice details for future reference.
Store the invoice information in the system.
Can you archive this invoice?

miniAgents.name: Invoice Manager
miniAgents.scope: Handles tasks related to generating and storing invoices for transactions, ensuring all invoice details are accurately recorded for tracking purposes.

intentWorkflows.name: Workflow for Track Income and Expenses
Workflow for Generate Cash Flow Insights
Workflow for Advise on Payment Timing
